doc.title: 16 for a Day
doc.plot: Eight children all born the day the Berlin Wall came down prepare to celebrate their 16th birthdays. This feature length film reveals the differences and similarities between a group of children from very different backgrounds and looks at the difficulties facing teenagers in the 21st century.
